name: Nede
description:
首先，感谢您游玩这个Demo。

First of all, thank you for playing this demo.

剧情，还没想好，因为暂时只做了个Demo。

I haven't thought about the plot yet, because I only made a demo for the time being.

基本操作:

Operate:

·方向键：左右走,上下是攀爬楼梯/绳子/竹竿之类的,下则是跳下部分单向平台/在空中的时候向下冲！

·Arrow key:  left and right keys is move, up and down keys is climb something, down key is  jump off the one way platform /dash down while in the air.

·跳跃：z

·Jump：z

·透支：x ，长按时，各项属性会随着按的时间长短而增幅。注意，蓄力过久会眩晕。

·Charge：x ，When you press and hold, various attributes will increase with the length of the press. but notice，If you charge too long, game role will get vertigo.

·调查：c

·Investigation something：c

·携带：x

·Carry something：x
